name: Rise of Mighty Pirates
description:
《Rise of Mighty Pirates》 is a first-gen round-based card game based on a exciting, classic theme popular all over the world, with refined character cards and ultra-cool effects. Why not join the battle and conquer the Star Sea!

FEATURES:

-MYRIAD SCENARIOS
Myriad scenarios, different stages, different scenes, and different lineups for unique, thrilling visual experiences!

-MULITPLE CHAT
Player can communicate across all severs, not just one server or guild, exchanging ideas and strategies with expert players to improve skills!

-VARIETY OF SHOPS
Acquire major heroes and rare resources with free redemptions. Get top-notch equipment without having to pay!

-SUPREME 5-ON-5 PVP
Regular 5-on-5 PVP battles with different combos and lineups, nothing set in stone.
